name: Easy Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - R | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Each question will consist of three or more clues. For instance, the three clues might read "Beverage - Hockey arena - Pen fluid". You must come up with these answers. The first answer is the longest word, the second answer will drop the first letter of the first answer, and the same thing happens to find the third word. In this case, the answers would be "Drink - Rink - Ink". I want you to type in ONLY the longest word, so in this example, you would type in "Drink".  Each answer in this quiz will begin with the letter R.

We start with 4 clues.

Tell a story - Excite - Tardy - Eaten
Printing type with straight letters - Arabian country - Male
Sorrow - Heron - Diminutive name of Margaret
questions.explanation:
